entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -1.5°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
